CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- LaMelo Ball isn't wasting any time making an impact in the NBA.
The rookie point guard became the youngest player in league history to record a triple-double with 22 points, 12 re… [+2022 chars]

articles.title: Pochettino off the mark as PSG punish Brest - The World Game
articles.description: Paris Saint-Germain saw off Brest 3-0 to collect their first victory under new head coach Mauricio Pochettino and close the gap on Ligue 1 leaders Lyon.
articles.content:
PSG were held to a 1-1 draw by Saint-Etienne in Pochettino's first game in charge on Thursday (AEDT) but had too much quality for Brest in Sunday's encounter at the Parc des Princes.
